mapper.delete: UODATE tsa_sys_parameter SET deleted = 1, updated_time = NOW() WHERE sya_param_id in(#{ids})
mapper.select: SELECT param_code AS paramCode, param_name AS paramName, param_value AS paramValue FROM tsa_sys_parameter WHERE param_code = #{paramCode} AND deleted = 0

SELECT sya_param_id AS syaParamId, param_code AS paramCode, param_name AS paramName, param_value AS paramValue, memo AS memo FROM tsa_sys_parameter WHERE deleted = 0 and (param_code like '%${qo.paramCodeOrParamName}%' or param_name like '%${qo.paramCodeOrParamName}%')
